label: specifiedPaymentTradeSettlement
comment: The information that enables the reconciliation of a payment with the item(s) that the payment is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.

domainIncludes.comment: The specific discharge obligations in respect of funds or securities transferred between two or more parties as part of a trade settlement.
A sum of money for which something is or may be bought or sold for trade purposes.
Common conditions contained in a contract or agreement applicable between trading partners.
